abstract: Most of the country’s recent big overseas takeovers have fared poorly. Large bets on oil, mining mines and finance were victims of terrible timing.
snippet: Most of the country’s recent big overseas takeovers have fared poorly. Large bets on oil, mining mines and finance were victims of terrible timing.
lead_paragraph: The ghosts of past failures haunt China’s new mergers and acquisitions players.

abstract: The Madrid branch of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China is accused of helping Chinese and Spanish criminal syndicates commit financial fraud.
snippet: The Madrid branch of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China is accused of helping Chinese and Spanish criminal syndicates commit financial fraud.
lead_paragraph: The Spanish police raided the Madrid subsidiary of one of China’s largest banks on Wednesday and arrested five of its directors as part of a broad investigation into money laundering.

headline.main: Spanish Unit of China’s ICBC Raided in Money Laundering Case
headline.print_headline: Police in Madrid Raid Unit of a Chinese Bank

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
